title: Beneath the pixels: The art direction of Super Time Force
text:
Beneath the pixels: The art direction of Super Time Force 
Published By: Gamasutra.com - Today 
A deep look at the decidedly non-retro pixel art direction for Capy Games' Super Time Force Ultra -- what it takes to make a "fever dream" o...
